meanings.definition: Avoiding or shunning lime or calcium.
meanings.sent1: The calcifugous plants thrive in acidic soil.
meanings.sent2: She prefers calcifugous soil for her garden.
meanings.sent3: The calcifugous flowers refused to grow near the limestone path.
meanings.sent4: His calcifugous nature kept him away from the calcium-rich foods.
meanings.sent5: The calcifugous leaves turned a vibrant green in the absence of calcium.

meanings.definition: A plant that avoids lime or calcium.
meanings.sent1: The gardener carefully tended to the calcifugous in the greenhouse.
meanings.sent2: The calcifugous in the forest thrived in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The calcifugous stood out among the other plants in the garden party.
meanings.sent4: The calcifugous was like a rebel in the world of plants, avoiding calcium at all costs.
meanings.sent5: The calcifugous plant's roots skillfully navigated away from any hint of lime.
